trans-unit.source: Identifies the reason for a Terminal Services session change.
trans-unit.target: 터미널 서비스 세션 변경의 이유를 식별합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current session change description.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 개체가 현재 세션 변경 설명과 같은지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The return value is `false` if `obj` is not a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> or if it is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 값은 `false` 경우 `obj` 않습니다는 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription>경우 `null`.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription>

trans-unit.source: Equality is determined by comparing the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> properties of the specified <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> structure to the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> properties of the current <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> structure.
trans-unit.target: 일치 여부를 비교 하 여 결정 됩니다는 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A>및 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A>의 지정 된 속성 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription>구조체는 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A>및 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A>현재 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription>구조.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two structures are considered equal if their properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 구조체는 해당 속성이 같은 것으로 간주 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 현재 비교할 개체를 <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: if obj is equal to the current structure; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 obj 현재 같은지 그렇지 그렇지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified session change description is equal to the current session change description.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 세션 변경 설명이 현재 세션 변경 설명과 같은지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Equality is determined by comparing the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> properties of the specified <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> structure to the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> properties of the current <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> structure.
trans-unit.target: 일치 여부를 비교 하 여 결정 됩니다는 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A>및 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A>의 지정 된 속성 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription>구조체는 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A>및 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A>현재 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription>구조.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two structures are considered equal if their properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 구조체는 해당 속성이 같은 것으로 간주 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"></xref> structure to compare to the current <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"> </xref> 현재 비교할 구조체 <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: if changeDescription is equal to the current structure; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 changeDescription 현재 같은지 그렇지 그렇지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the current session change description.
trans-unit.target: 현재 세션 변경 설명에 대 한 해시 코드를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned hash code is calculated from the values of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 해시 코드의 값에서 계산 되는 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A>및 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.SessionId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Reason%2A>

trans-unit.source: The hash code should not be used to compare <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription> instances.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 해시 코드를 사용 해야 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription>인스턴스.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription>

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current session change description.
trans-unit.target: 현재 세션에 대 한 해시 코드 설명을 변경 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether two <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"></xref> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"> </xref> 구조체가 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This operator is implemented using the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Equals%28System.Object%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 연산자를 사용 하 여 구현 되는 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Equals%28System.Object%29>메서드.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Equals%28System.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: if a and b are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if a and b are equal; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether two <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"></xref> structures are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"> </xref> 구조체가 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This operator is implemented using the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Equals%28System.Object%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 연산자를 사용 하 여 구현 되는 <xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Equals%28System.Object%29>메서드.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription.Equals%28System.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription"> </xref> 구조입니다.

trans-unit.source: if a and b are not equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if a and b are not equal; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the reason for the session change.
trans-unit.target: 세션 변경에 대 한 이유를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeReason"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeReason"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the session ID for the associated session.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 세션에 대 한 세션 ID를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The session ID for the associated session.
trans-unit.target: 연결된 된 세션에 대 한 세션 ID입니다.
